snippet.title: Wild Seasons - Steam Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Wild Seasons is a roguelike, deck-gardener. Cultivate a garden that grows mystical cards, orchestrate unique decks as your plants evolve, and coordinate strategic plays across multiple turns to unleash wildly powerful combos!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2595120/Wild_Seasons/?utm_source=youtube

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/wildseasonsgame
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/Xcy37eBgDm
